      • fireBeforePropertyChange

        protected static void fireBeforePropertyChange(OAObject oaObj,
                            java.lang.String propertyName,
                            java.lang.Object oldObj,
                            java.lang.Object newObj,
                            boolean bLocalOnly,
                            boolean bSetChanged)
        Used to manage property changes. Sends a "hubPropertyChange()" to all listeners of the Hubs that this object is a member of.

      • firePropertyChange

        protected static void firePropertyChange(OAObject oaObj,
                      java.lang.String propertyName,
                      java.lang.Object oldObj,
                      java.lang.Object newObj,
                      boolean bLocalOnly,
                      boolean bSetChanged)
        Used to manage property changes. This will: 1: update null property information for primitive property types 2: update the objectKey, which would then update the ObjectCache 3: update object hubs if this is a reference property change 4: Send "hubPropertyChange()" to all listeners of the Hubs that this object is a member of. 5: Send event to Server.
        See Also:
        to suppress this method from running by the current thread.
